FuncDef: The acl ipv6 name command creates a basic ACL6 and displays the ACL6 view. If the basic ACL6 to be created already exists, running this command directly displays the ACL6 view. The acl ipv6 name command creates a basic ACL6 and displays the ACL6 view. If the basic ACL6 to be created already exists, running this command directly displays the ACL6 view. By default, no basic ACL6 is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Creates a basic ACL6 with a keyword.
-

Creates a basic ACL6 with a name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: A basic ACL6 defines rules for filtering packets based on the source IP addresses of packets. To create a basic ACL6, run the acl ipv6 command.
